title: Kentucky Bourbon Benefit: New Riff Preview
itunes:title: Kentucky Bourbon Benefit: New Riff Preview
description: The Kentucky Bourbon Benefit closes Aug. 21 at 11 a.m. The rare bourbon auction proceeds help the flood victims of Eastern Kentucky. Here is a preview of the New Riff options, including a super rare 8-year New Riff barrel up for grabs. Learn More: https://one.bidpal.net/kybourbonbenefit/welcome
